section.section: Subject to the provisions of paragraphs (2) and (3) of this subsection, the board may suspend a member of the supervisory committee.

The suspension:
Shall be by a two-thirds vote of the board; and
Takes effect immediately and remains in effect until the board convenes a meeting of the members to vote on the suspension.

Immediately after the board votes to suspend a member of the supervisory committee, the board shall:
Call a meeting of the members, to be held no later than 15 days after the date of the suspension, for the purpose of voting on the suspension; and
Notify the Commissioner in writing about the suspension.
